name: A demure nacre brooch
data: It increases the users constitution adequately.
It decreases the users wisdom poorly.
It increases the users intelligence strongly.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration superbly.
This item loses its magical powers a bit faster than avarage.
It increases the users psionic resistance somewhat.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'offensive efficiency'.
